patthana15.76:1.1: Saraṇaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:2.1: Araṇaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.76:3.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:4.1: Saraṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:5.1: Araṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.76:6.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:7.1: Saraṇaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
